original_title: Members appointed to Finance, National Procurement Commissions
original_body_lines: New members have been appointed to the National Procurement Commission and the Finance Commission by President Ranil Wickremesinghe on the recommendation of the Constitutional Council, President's Media Division (PMD) said.

Accordingly, W. Sudharma Karunaratne was appointed as Chairman of the National Procurement Commission while Warnakulasuriya Ivan Thisera, D. Piyasiri Daranagama, Sumandiran Sinnakandu, and A.G. Pubudu Asanga Gunawamsa were appointed as its other members.
Meanwhile, Sumith Abeysinghe was appointed as Chairperson of the Finance Commission while Tuan Nalin Osen and Mr. Mayen Wamadevan were appointed as its members.
